Name: Parliamentary election
Description: This type should be used for any general election which includes the election of parliament. It includes properties which are particular to parliamentary elections.

Properties.Name: Government formed by
Properties.Description: For parliamentary and similar systems, the party or parties that formed the government.

Properties.Name: Resulting head of government
Properties.Description: If, as the result of this election, a head of government was chosen (e.g. by the newly-elected parliament), enter that person here.  Do not enter anything if this election did not result in a head of government (in some parliamentary systems, the head of government is selected independently of the parliament).

Properties.Name: Resulting head of state
Properties.Description: If, as the result of this election, a head of state was chosen (e.g. by the newly-elected parliament), enter that person here.  Do not enter anything if this election did not result in a head of state (in many parliamentary systems, the head of state is selected independently of the parliament).
